name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.read.striped.threadpool.size
description:
The maximum number of threads used for parallel reading
    in striped layout.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

name: dfs.ha.log-roll.period
description:
How often, in seconds, the StandbyNode should ask the active to
    roll edit logs. Since the StandbyNode only reads from finalized
    log segments, the StandbyNode will only be as up-to-date as how
    often the logs are rolled. Note that failover triggers a log roll
    so the StandbyNode will be up to date before it becomes active.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.port
description:
Default port that the ShuffleHandler will run on. ShuffleHandler
   is a service run at the NodeManager to facilitate transfers of intermediate
   Map outputs to requesting Reducers.

name: ipc.[port_number].scheduler.priority.levels
description:
How many priority levels to use within the scheduler and call
    queue. This property applies to RpcScheduler and CallQueue.
